text: Burton Greene (June 14, 1937 â€“ June 28, 2021) was an American free jazz pianist. He was born in Chicago, Illinois. He was most known for his work in New York City. His music had multiple genres, including avant-garde jazz and the Klezmer medium. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2021 deaths Category:American jazz musicians Category:American pianists Category:Musicians from Chicago
title: Burton Greene
